activities:
See privacy policy: 
http://www.accinfosys.com/AIS-privacy-policy.html

Personal Information

Accurate Information System, LLC. collects personal information from you when you order a credit file, criminal history search, civil history or employment and education verification. When you visit the Accurate Information System, LLC.'s web site to obtain a copy of your credit report or a prospective employees, personal information is requested in order to process the request and perform identity verification. This information may include your name, mailing address (current and previous), your Social Security number, date of birth, phone number, the name of your employer, and other information. In addition, we capture this information to ensure that your credit report and any and all other reports are delivered to you.

Use of Information

Under no circumstances will we provide or disclose any information regarding your credit history. We do not share, disclose or sell any information that can be used to authenticate your identity such as your Social Security number, Date of Birth or mother's maiden name.

We do not share, sell, distribute or otherwise make public any information that may reveal identity to any company or individual except those that are authorized by you
